original_text: After that, some people brought a man to Jesus. The man had a bad spirit in him. Because of this, he was blind and he could not speak. Jesus caused the man to become well again. The man could speak again and he could see.
korean_text: 그 때에 귀신 들려 눈 멀고 말 못하는 사람을 데리고 왔거늘 예수께서 고쳐 주시매 그 말 못하는 사람이 말하며 보게 된지라

sentences.original_text: After that, some people brought a man to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 어떤 사람들이 한 남자를 예수님께 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: The man had a bad spirit in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자는 그 안에 악한 영이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Because of this, he was blind
Jesus caused the man to become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 그 남자를 다시 건강하게 만드셨습니다
그 남자는 다시 말을 할 수 있었습니다
